sentence.text: We report a sibling pair with FTHS caused by a homozygous, novel mutation pLys133Glnfs*13 in the superoxide metabolic process gene: one sibling had bilateral ocular hypertension and unilateral colobomas of iris, choroid and retina; the other, unilateral myelinated nerve fiber layer of the optic disk and papilledema due to idiopathic intracranial hypertension.
